text: Aigle Noir Makamba FC, is a football (soccer) club based in Makamba and currently playing in the Burundi Premier League.Primus Ligue : Aigle Noir de Makamba remporte la victoire contre Bujumbura City ==Honours== *Burundi Premier League: 1 :2018–19 *Burundian Cup: 1 :2019 *Burundi Super Cup: 1 :2019 *Coupe de l'Unité: 1 :2020 ==External links== * Burundi League history (RSSSF) ==References== Category:Football clubs in Burundi
title: Aigle Noir Makamba FC
